PRODUCT-DELIVERY.MODAL-DESCRIPTION: We calculate the delivery date considering:

PRODUCT-DELIVERY.MODAL-POINT-2: Once they have the package, the

PRODUCT-REFUND.DESCRIPTION: Buy with peace of mind using our shipping service. Transaction protected with refund, secure payments, and assistance whenever you need it.
PRODUCT-REFUND.MODAL-DESCRIPTION: When you purchase your product using our shipping service, we charge a fee for:
PRODUCT-REFUND.MODAL-POINT-1: ✔ Protecting your money until you verify that the product is in good condition.
PRODUCT-REFUND.MODAL-POINT-2: ✔ Refunding the amount if the product is not as described. If you need to return it, it's free.
PRODUCT-REFUND.MODAL-POINT-3: ✔ Refunding you if the product is lost or damaged during shipping.
